collision

Class CollisionComputer

  • java.lang.Object
    • collision.CollisionComputer

  • public class CollisionComputer
extends java.lang.Object
    computes impact of assumed collision between an active and a passive entity on the active entity. Does not modify the entities.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      CollisionComputer(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity active, com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity passive)

      • CollisionComputer

        public CollisionComputer(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity active,
                 com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity passive)
        Parameters:
        active - active entity: entity involved in collision and belonging to the accelerable family
        passive - passive entity: counter part to active entity

    • Method Detail

      • getCollidingSide

        public Shape getCollidingSide()
        Returns:
        a side of the active entity's body which collides with any part of the body of the passive entity

      • collisionForce

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 collisionForce()
        Returns:
